message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only able to pay $18000 for it at this time.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $19500. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'm unable to match $19500 for the product. I'll look into purchasing it from John instead.
